title: League freezing when game starts
body: Recently been having a problem where after a game starts, it freezes after a few sec. I cant even alt f4 or ctr alt delete so i have to restart my computer. When I reconnect, the same thing happens. Gotten a leaver buster already pls help

replies.body: A recent Windows update auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html), which has been known to be causing freezing, buzzing sounds, and some fps issues for a few players.  Disabling it should get this fixed up.  Let me know if your issue still persists!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ozihEety,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-09-27T21:15:27.665+0000)
>
> A recent Windows update auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html), which has been known to be causing freezing, buzzing sounds, and some fps issues for a few players.  Disabling it should get this fixed up.  Let me know if your issue still persists!

How do i disable it?
right click on league of legends launcher, go to properties, go to compatability, change it to windows 7 and click apply. worked for me.

> [{quoted}](name=Kick Save,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ozihEety,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-09-27T20:18:20.128+0000)
>
> right click on league of legends launcher, go to properties, go to compatability, change it to windows 7 and click apply. worked for me.

Thanks that fixed it for me! Only tried in a custom for now but will probably go into a normals later

Same thing happen after the most recently windows 10 upgrade, to fixed this I run as admin and this only work for game start..... then as soon as the game end it freezes again....... anyone have better solution on this?
Did it start after updating windows? Because that's what happened to me
Mine started today after win10 9/26/16 service auto update

> [{quoted}](name=jslayer20,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ozihEety,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-26T17:04:03.828+0000)
>
> Did it start after updating windows? Because that's what happened to me

No my computer has been windows 10 for a long time and just started happening yesterday.
If you guys still have this problem, what worked for me was changing to windowed mode, but I'm pretty sure it's something about Nvidia detecting the game, so a complete reinstall will probably work.
Anyone have any update to this problem? Its kind of ruining my days off...

i thought im the only one. before windows update i played and it was fine. after it, game crashed. i tryed to undo windows update and run lol but it was still crashing, then i tryed to reinstall lol  and it still crashes.
Same thing is happening to me.  I windows 10 updated last night and first game today locked up my entire computer.
The same thing happens to me, audio glitches and and skips frames and then completely crashes my pc.
The exact same thing is happening to me.
Same thing happens to me. Haven't  played in a few days and tried to play earlier and got leaver buster as well... please help.......
